answerText: quantum tunneling[10] Gamow used this approximation to formulate his theory of quantum tunneling in nuclei during alpha decay. This technique is used to obtain approximate solutions to the one-dimensional time-independent Schrödinger equation.

subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this process in which a particle penetrates a barrier which it is classically forbidden to penetrate.
